long_description: The updated multiday Granite Gear Virga 2 Pack offers ultralight backpacking enthusiasts redesigned shoulder straps, a true roll-top closure and a padded hip belt for enhanced comfort and performance. Smaller hardware and 10mm webbing cut the weight of the pack. Fixed, padded hipbelt fits a wide range of waist sizes. Large, stretch-mesh side pockets for water bottles or wands; stretch-mesh front pocket accommodates a rain jacket or extra layer. Extended overflow collar provides extra volume when needed. Internal hydration hanger and ports for hydration tube (reservoir sold separately). The Granite Gear Virga 2 Pack features dual tool loops and 10mm webbing compression straps.
